content: cute little hideaway nappy / diaper cover perfect for baby dolls too requires dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles 4 small buttons knitted in one piece - no seams button fronts allow for easy access sizes 6 months 0-3 months early newborn/large preemie medium preemie small preemie angel baby doll easy and quick to knit **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
